ISSUE.TITLE: ui_next dependency updates
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### SUMMARY - update pf libs to latest - remove all security warnings* `*` The last time I checked, this means updating `axios` which in turn breaks some of our unit tests. Part of the work here will involve investigating this and making the necessary fixes to get the tests green after updating.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4434 from ryanpetrello/jinja-injector-sandbox-validation prevent unsafe jinja from being saved in the first place for cred types
